text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Pertama-tama, ayo kita temui Uma Musume yang akan kita latih!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Uma Musume yang akan kamu latih disebut trainable Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Perlu diperhatikan, kamu tidak bisa melatih Uma Musume sampai kamu mendapatkan versi latihannya.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Di gacha ini, kamu akan bertemu Uma Musume yang akan kamu latih!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Kalau begitu, mari kita ambil dari gacha Pretty Derby!
